Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>……なぜオレが、 おまえの兄貴になるんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>... Why did you call me your brother?

Entry.JapaneseText: いいじゃん、兄弟みたいなもんでしょ？ それに、ボクたちって、案外似てると思うけど？
Entry.EnglishText: Why not, don't you think we're kinda like brothers? I think we look surprisingly similar, in a way?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえはまだいい。 俺は、召し使い扱いだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Consider yourself lucky. I was being treated like a servant.

Entry.JapaneseText: だ、だってさぁ……<Eugene>をお父さんだ なんて言ったら、怪しまれるじゃない。
Entry.EnglishText: W-Well, that's... If I called you my dad, he would've gotten suspicious!

Entry.JapaneseText: それにしても、他に言いようが あったろうに。まったく……
Entry.EnglishText: Even then, you probably could have phrased it differently... Honestly...
